name: Art Thief (dancar)
description:
Steal as many paintings as possible and escape before the time runs out!

Unlock the doors and disarm the alarms on the valuable paintings and make your way towards the red exit door before the time runs out!

Tips for an enjoyable experience

  • Every time you steal a painting you get a couple of bonus seconds added to the timer :)
  • Try to locate the red exit door early on. It's always located a couple of rooms away from the starting room.
  • Read the in-game help
  • The music loop is ~30 seconds long, and it's not exactly good music, so press the M key to mute ;)

Known bugs / issues: 

  • Some door puzzles are generated with overlapping handles. Fix it by leaving the puzzle (Escape key) and try it again.
  • The door puzzles are unresponsive (can't rotate) for the fist second or so, so just be patient :)
  • The left and bottom doors in the start room opens the wrong way...

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys: Move player / Highlight stuff in puzzles

C: Interact with paintings and doors. Rotate clockwise (Right) in puzzles

X: Rotate counter clockwise (Left) in puzzles

R: Reset puzzle

Esc: Toggle menu

M: Mute sound

TAB: Map
